title: Christine Lagarde - Wikipedia
snippet: On 2 July 2019, Christine Lagarde was nominated by the European Council to succeed Mario Draghi as President of the European Central Bank (ECB) on 1 November 2019.

title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: Although Axel Weber was tipped as one of the possible successors, he resigned from the ECB in protest at the bail out policies. title: ECBâ€™s Lagarde says Knot would be suitable successor - report By Investing.com
snippet: Investing.com -- European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said Klaas Knot would be a suitable successor, according to Dutch newswire ANP, which cited a podcast episode of "College Leaders in Finance" set to be released on Sunday.
